hero.lead: Abay GERD Token distribution is LIVE! Get your hands on 10,000 free GERD tokens and join the financial revolution.

intro.feature_p2: Abay GERD Token (GERD) is a decentralized cryptocurrency inspired by Ethiopia's Grand Renaissance Dam and the Abay River. Built for the world but rooted in Ethiopia, GERD Token honors the people who made the dam possible.

hero.title: QnA: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.lead: Get answers to common questions about token rewards, vesting, and the GERD Token ecosystem

qna.rewards_title: Why Are Token Rewards Different by Region?

q1.title: Why do Ethiopia originated wallets receive 75,000 GERD while others get 10,000 GERD tokens?
q1.body: The Abay GERD Token was created as a tribute to the people of Ethiopia who collectively funded and built the Grand Renaissance Dam without external aid. This project represents unity, self-determination, and national pride. As such, Ethiopia is at the heart of this initiative and receive the highest reward.

q2.title: Why does the rest of the world receive 10,000 GERD?
q2.body: Global participants are essential to the success of any decentralized project. We welcome and appreciate your support. The 10,000 GERD reward reflects both inclusivity and our commitment to keeping the token's value sustainable while prioritizing communities most directly connected to the project's origin.

q3.title: Isn't this unfair or discriminatory?
q3.body: Not at all. This is mission-aligned distribution, not exclusion. Every user, regardless of region or background, is eligible to receive tokens and participate freely. The distribution structure ensures that those who contributed to building the foundation are recognized and empowered in proportion to their efforts.

q4.title: Will I still be able to trade or earn more GERD tokens?
q4.body: Yes. GERD tokens will remain tradable for all users worldwide. Once 10,000 wallets have successfully claimed tokens and the token is listed on a centralized exchange (CEX), users will also be eligible to participate in future rewards, airdrops, and community-driven initiatives.

q1.title: What is "vesting" and why should I care?
q1.body: Vesting is a way to release tokens in small, scheduled portions over time instead of giving them all out at once. For the GERD Token, vesting means exactly 1 billion tokens will be released every year for the next 115 years. This creates long-term stability and prevents large dumps on the market.

q2.title: Who controls the tokens right now?
q2.body: As of now, 115 billion GERD tokens are still in a wallet controlled by a single human. They are waiting for the vesting system (smart contract) to go live on the blockchain. Once vesting is live, the tokens will be governed by the contract.

q3.title: What happens when the vesting contract goes live?
q3.body: Once deployed, the tokens will be transferred to a secure, decentralized program called a smart contract — it will automatically release tokens once per year. It's tamper-proof and cannot be changed once deployed.

q4.title: How are those 1 billion tokens used every year?
q4.body: Each year, the 1 billion tokens are split: 500 million distributed to holders, 250 million for staking rewards, and 250 million for liquidity or burning.

vesting.support: This structure supports long-term health, rewards active holders, and avoids inflation.

how_used.title: How are those 1 billion tokens used every year?
how_used.lead: Each year, when 1 billion GERD tokens are released:

vesting.allocation1_caption: Divided and sent to all holders

q5.title: Will everyone get the same amount?
q5.body: Yes, the 500 million tokens for holders are shared equally — not based on how much GERD you hold. Every wallet holding any amount of GERD will receive the same fixed amount during each yearly release.

q6.title: Can anyone stop or change this system later?
q6.body: Absolutely not. Once the tokens are inside the vesting smart contract, they are locked and cannot be changed by anyone.

q7.title: Why is this good for the community?
q7.body: This system removes the need to trust any individual. It guarantees fairness, provides predictable rewards, and supports long-term community growth.

q8.title: So what should I do now?
q8.body: Hold GERD tokens in your own wallet (not on an exchange) before each yearly release to automatically receive your share. No action is required — it's handled by the smart contract.

testnet.title: Vesting Release Dashboard on Testnet
testnet.lead: Real-time tracking of the GERD Token Vesting contract testing on BSC Testnet

info.title: Testnet Testing Information
info.body: This dashboard is for community members to follow the progress of the GERD Token Vesting contract testing on the BSC Testnet. To simulate a long-term token release (1 billion GERD tokens per year for 115 years), the vesting contract on testnet is configured to release 1 billion tokens every Wednesday. This allows for faster testing of what would normally happen over years in production. The data below is read directly from the blockchain and updates in real-time.

testnet.no_release: No token release has occurred yet

hero.title: Abay GERD Token - Community AMA
hero.lead: Everything you need to know about GERD Token — straight from the team.

final.title: Final Words?
final.lead: GERD is more than a token. It's a movement. Claim your share. Contribute. Grow with us.

migration.title: Official GERD Token Migration Announcement

why.title: Why was this migration necessary?
why.body: The original GERD Token contract, deployed on April 23, 2023, was designed to support a long-term, community-first initiative for digital value creation in underserved regions. During a routine security audit, we identified a minor vulnerability in the allowance logic. No funds were lost, but to maintain trust and transparency, we migrated to a new, immutable contract.

migration.burn_notice: 99.99% of the legacy contract's supply has been burned to a dead address.
migration.whats_new_title: What's new in the upgraded GERD contract?
migration.summary: Total Supply: 120,000,000,000 GERD (2 decimals) | ERC-20 Compliant: Fully standard and compatible

airdrop.title: Airdrop Completed — What You Need to Know
airdrop.lead: The token migration and airdrop process has successfully completed ahead of schedule. All balances have been updated under the new contract.
airdrop.alert: No action is required — if you held GERD before the migration, your new token balance is already in your wallet.

howto.title: How to View Your GERD Tokens
howto.lead: To view your new GERD token balance:
howto.step1: Open your wallet app (e.g., MetaMask, Trust Wallet)

thanks.title: Thank You
thanks.lead: Thank you for your continued trust in the GERD Token project. This migration strengthens our foundation for the next phase of growth and guarantees a secure, transparent, and decentralized future.

migration.update_saved_contracts: Please update any saved contract references to the new address.

hero.title: Abay GERD Token - Project Timeline
hero.lead: A comprehensive journey through the development and milestones of the GERD Token project

timeline.final_message: The journey has just begun. GERD is built to last.

overview.title: Overview of the Vesting Plan
overview.lead1: The Abay GERD Token (GERD) has a transformative vesting strategy designed to enhance long-term value, promote stability, and build trust through full transparency.
overview.lead2: In addition to the milestone airdrop distributed to all existing wallet addresses on May 5, 2025 to commemorate its 2-year anniversary, GERD Token has introduced a long-term vesting framework to further demonstrate its commitment to sustainability and ongoing community rewards.
overview.lead3: A total of 115 billion tokens will be locked in a secure, immutable smart contract, with a scheduled release of 1 billion tokens per year over the next 115 years; this ensures a consistent and predictable distribution model that incentivizes long-term holding and active participation.

alert.info: The smart contract is fully autonomous and irreversible. Once deployed, its rules cannot be modified or bypassed—neither by the original developers nor any external party. The vesting schedule and token release conditions will be permanently embedded in the blockchain and remain verifiable by anyone at any time.

locked.title: 115 Billion Tokens Locked
locked.lead: Secured in an irreversible smart contract on Binance Smart Chain (BSC)

annual.title: Annual Release of 1 Billion
annual.lead: Starting April 23, 2026, 1 billion tokens released annually

airdropped.title: 500 Million Airdropped
airdropped.lead: Distributed evenly to all active GERD holders—no action needed

staking.title: 250 Million for Staking
staking.lead: For users who stake GERD tokens, encouraging engagement

liquidity.title: 250 Million for Liquidity or Burn
liquidity.lead: Added to liquidity if under 500M; otherwise burned

verifiable.title: Publicly Verifiable
verifiable.lead: All activity is traceable and transparent on-chain

participation.title: Long-Term Participation
participation.lead: Encourages long-term participation with annual rewards

decentralized.title: Decentralized Model
decentralized.lead: Aligns with a decentralized financial model for the GERD community

community.title: A Community-Driven Digital Asset
community.lead: GERD Token's value comes from its community, not institutions. Its adoption and utility define its worth—like Bitcoin, it's a decentralized people-powered asset.

generational.title: A Generational Asset
generational.lead: Designed to last over a century, GERD Token is a long-term digital inheritance. Early holders benefit most from the annual airdrop structure.

ahead.title: Looking Ahead
ahead.lead: GERD Token continues to grow on principles of fairness, transparency, and generational wealth. Its vesting mechanism offers a rare chance to build digital legacy for years to come.

vesting.final_message: The journey has just begun. GERD is built to last.

home.invite: We especially invite participation from unbanked communities with internet access. Help us expand awareness and empower more people to claim their share of this national digital legacy.
home.hybrid_model: This hybrid model promotes global inclusion while giving special priority to users in Ethiopia — especially unbanked communities with access to mobile devices and internet. It's our way of honoring the people behind the GERD project.

how.title: Develop the Future with Us
